citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 145 pm on
12-Sep-18.
Arrived at facility at 145 pm. Inspector spoke to co-worker at shop who stated licensee was out of town for work
and will be gone the entire day.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 145 pm on
12-Sep-18.
Arrived at facility at 145 pm.  Inspector spoke to co-worker at shop who stated licensee was out of town for work
and will be gone the entire day.
